--- "Chappell, Simon P" <simon.chappell@...> wrote:
> Does anyone have any examples of code that captures the standard out
> of
> a Java program.

    ByteArrayOutputStream newOut = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
    System.setOut(new PrintStream(newOut));

Don't forget to System.out.flush() before getting the data from newOut.
